reviewText: I saw the effort that went into making this first movie. Serious work and professionalism show in the the end product: a very well acted  (most of the actors are pursuing excellent careers) and expertly photographed film. So much more interesting than a lot of the junk being peddled by major studios!

This movie has an indie flair, but does not feel like it was produced by an amateur. I really enjoyed it. The plot is nothing to write home about, but the acting and crafting of the scenes (each scene is short and sweet; nothing is dragged out) is suberb. I highly recommend this movie!
